author: Jacob Dressler
description:
For fans interested in finding a new horror series worth watching, it’s always a good idea to look at the recommendations made by author Stephen King. In addition to his own library of classic works that include the likes of Carrie and The Shining, King often takes time to highlight the projects of other creators. [...]

title: Stephen King Praises “Scary” Horror Series Streaming For Free

author: Jacob Dressler
description:
The Marvel Cinematic Universe has turned into an ever-expanding franchise with a thriving continuity tied to dozens of beloved films and shows. The studio isn’t always eager to renew some of its properties, however, and now one Disney Plus series tied to the MCU has been reportedly canceled. Cancellations are always frustrating, especially when it [...]
